short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the arrow keys to skip forwards or backwards on a video by a custom amount. Supports skipping by a different amount whileâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the arrow keys to skip forwards or backwards on a video by a custom amount. Supports skipping by a different amount while holding shift. You can also choose to adjust the skip amount based on the playback speed (i.e. if you are playing the video at 0.5 speed, the skip amount will be halved).
